claimEnd.label: Do you know the date you want to claim until?
claimEnd.hint:
This could be:

  • when you think you'll go back to work, if you're currently off sick
  • when you returned to work, if you're claiming for a time in the past

errors.required: Select yes if you know the date you want to claim until

claimEndDate.label: Date you want to claim until

errors.required: Enter the date you want to claim until
errors.missingDay: Date you want to claim until must include a day
errors.missingMonth: Date you want to claim until must include a month
errors.missingYear: Date you want to claim until must include a year
errors.missingDayAndMonth: Date you want to claim until must include a day and a month
errors.missingDayAndYear: Date you want to claim until must include a day and a year
errors.missingMonthAndYear: Date you want to claim until must include a month and a year
errors.badFormatYear: Enter the date you want to claim until with a year in the right format, for example 2020 not 20
errors.notReal: Enter a real date you want to claim until
errors.notRealDigits: Enter a real date you want to claim until using only digits
errors.outOfRange: The date you want to claim until cannot be earlier than your claim start date
